com.crs.flipkart.dao

Interface ProfessorDaoInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfessorDaoService

    public interface ProfessorDaoInterface
    ProfessorDaoService dao interface

    • Method Detail

      • viewCourses

        java.util.List<Course> viewCourses()
        Method to obtain a list of courses using SQL commands
        Returns:
        returns the courses present in the database

      • selectCourse

        void selectCourse(java.lang.String professorId,
                  java.lang.String courseId)
           throws CourseNotFoundException,
                  CourseNotAvailableException,
                  CourseAlreadyIndicatedException
        Method to check if the course is already alloted or not, and then to allot the course using SQL commands
        Parameters:
        professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if course with courseId not present in the database
        CourseNotAvailableException - if course with courseId already alloted to some professor
        CourseAlreadyIndicatedException - if course already selected by professor

      • viewEnrolledStudents

        java.util.List<Student> viewEnrolledStudents(java.lang.String courseId)
        Method for retrieving the students enrolled in a course using SQL commands
        Parameters:
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Returns:
        returns a list of strings indicating the students enrolled in a course from the database

      • addGrade

        java.lang.String addGrade(java.lang.String studentId,
                          java.lang.String courseId,
                          float grade,
                          java.lang.String semester)
        Method for adding the grades of a student for a course in a semester using SQL commands
        Parameters:
        studentId - unique Id to represent a student
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        grade - grade point provided for the student enrolled in the course taught by the professor
        semester - indicates the semester
        Returns:
        returns a string indicating the if the grade was successfully added in the database
